definitions.definition: The stalk of a leaf , attaching the blade to the stem .
A narrow or constricted segment of the body of an insect ; especially, the metasomal segment of certain Hymenoptera , such as wasps.
The stalk at the base of the nest of the paper wasp .

main_definition: ( botany ) The stalk of a leaf , attaching the blade to the stem .
secondary_definitions: ( entomology , insect anatomy ) A narrow or constricted segment of the body of an insect ; especially, the metasomal segment of certain Hymenoptera , such as wasps.
( entomology ) The stalk at the base of the nest of the paper wasp .
